vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.26;
son of: Seth (H8352);
father of: Kenan (H7018); also called Enos at Luk.3.38;
Also named: Enōs<\i> (Ἐνώς "Enos" G1800)
§ Enos = "man"
son of Seth
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以挪士 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "人"
塞特的兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以挪士 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "人"
塞特的儿子
